raw_comment:
1. What do you notice?
I notice a high percentage in players of color in each of the sports shown.

2. What do you wonder?
I wonder why the percentage of Head coaches of color is so low.

3.What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts me and my community by lowering the chances of someone of color potentially becoming a head coach

4. What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.

The graph shows the clear difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of Head coaches of color in each major sport shown.

Diversity in major sports League
ace_sentences: I notice a high percentage of players of color in each sport in the graph.
I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is low.
This situation lowers the chance that a person of color becomes a head coach.
The graph shows a clear difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of head coaches of color in each major sport in the graph.
The headline is: Diversity in major sports league.
